book.synopsis: Contains three books about Pippi - Pippi Longstocking, Pippi Goes Aboard, and Pippi in the South Seas. This work is illustrated throughout by best-selling artist, Tony Ross, who has illustrated the cover. Astrid Lindgren has won numerous awards including the Hans Christian Andersen Award and the International Book Award.
book.title_long: The Best of Pippi Longstocking : Three Books in One
